statements: SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT headline FROM news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0
SELECT * FROM news_sentiment ORDER BY headline ASC
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8
SELECT * FROM news_sentiment ORDER BY headline DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_sentiment WHERE headline LIKE '%coronavirus%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT headline, ROUND(sentiment_score, 2) AS rounded_score FROM news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM news_sentiment;
SELECT * FROM news_headlines;
SELECT headline FROM news_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, headline FROM news_headlines ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'subjective' AND sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT id, headline, sentiment FROM news_headlines JOIN sentiment_analysis ON news_headlines.id = sentiment_analysis.headline_id;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY headline ASC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines WHERE headline LIKE '%pandemic%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 AND headline LIKE '%climate%' ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines nh JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON nh.id = sa.headline_id WHERE sa.analysis_type = 'positive' ORDER BY nh.sentiment_score DESC;

SELECT headline, sentiment_score, analysis_type, sentiment FROM news_headlines nh JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON nh.id = sa.headline_id WHERE sentiment = 'neutral' AND nh.sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY nh.headline DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_headlines;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_scores LEFT JOIN news_headlines ON sentiment_scores.news_id = news_headlines.headline_id;
SELECT network_name, last_trained FROM trading_neural_networks ORDER BY last_trained DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_headlines ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_scores INNER JOIN news_headlines ON sentiment_scores.news_id = news_headlines.headline_id;
SELECT headline FROM news_headlines WHERE headline LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT network_name, last_trained FROM trading_neural_networks ORDER BY last_trained DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_headlines ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT headline, published_date FROM news_headlines WHERE id = 1
SELECT headline, score FROM news_headlines JOIN sentiment_scores ON news_headlines.id = sentiment_scores.headline_id
SELECT * FROM trading_networks WHERE strategy = 'High Frequency Trading'
SELECT network_name, strategy FROM trading_networks ORDER BY network_name ASC
SELECT * FROM news_headlines ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT headline, published_date FROM news_headlines WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT n.network_id, n.network_name, d.decision FROM trading_networks n JOIN trading_decisions d ON n.network_id = d.network_id
SELECT headline, score FROM news_headlines JOIN sentiment_scores ON news_headlines.id = sentiment_scores.headline_id
SELECT * FROM trading_decisions WHERE decision = 'BUY' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM news_headlines;
SELECT headline_text, sentiment_score FROM news_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT network_name, performance_score FROM trading_networks WHERE performance_score < 0.8;
SELECT analyst_name, expertise_area FROM analysts WHERE expertise_area = 'Finance';
SELECT trade_type, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades ORDER BY trade_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY headline_id DESC;
SELECT network_name, performance_score FROM trading_networks WHERE performance_score < 0.7;
SELECT analyst_name, expertise_area FROM analysts ORDER BY analyst_id ASC;
SELECT trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'buy' AND trade_quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_price DESC;

SELECT trade_type, trade_quantity, trade_price, analyst_name FROM trades JOIN trade_analysis ON trades.trade_id = trade_analysis.trade_id JOIN analysts ON trade_analysis.analyst_id = analysts.analyst_id WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe';
